step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your shoulders relaxed as you begin the roll.
Excellent! Focus on squeezing your shoulder blades together and down.
Nice circular motion. Remember to breathe deeply as you roll back.
Great continuation. Ensure your movement is smooth and controlled.
Very good. Keep the focus on the shoulder blade squeeze and downward motion.
Well done! You're maintaining good form throughout the exercise.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the shoulder rolls! Remember to gently squeeze your shoulder blades back and down in a smooth circle. Try to inhale deeply when rolling back to help with breathing and lymphatic flow.
